1. '''Check Touchscreen protocols are supported''' 
  a. Single tap on screen to; Select document or application icon, Drop Down menu expand, dialog close/maximise/minimise, and Ok/Cancel buttons.

  a. Double tap on screen to; Launch applications, Open document in preferred application, Select all text in field, minimise application window.

  a. Double tap and drag on screen to; Drag selected icon, Grab and move horizontal and vertical scroll sliders, Open a multi-select box.

  a. Slide finger across screen to; Horizonally/Vertically scroll document
